name: entomo
description: entomo is a people experience platform built for the digital world of work. Powering 30mn+ users across organizations world-wide, entomo unleashes digital experiences that transform engagement, performance and talent development using hyper personalized insights and nudges. entomo’s clients include Global fortune 500 and large enterprises and Governments across Asia and MEA. entomo is also voted as a leader in G2 software marketplace across multiple categories

Personalized insights and nudges to drive powerful performance behaviors
Engage and empower talent development and skills
Headline: unleash people experiences that transform performance, engagement and talent
ShortDescription: people experience platform built for the digital world of work

Highlights.name: achieve peak employee performance
Highlights.description: Empower your people with Generative AI to perform by intelligently aligning goals, and AI driven nudges and insights

Highlights.name: prioritize your people's wellness
Highlights.description: Transform employee wellbeing with AI driven anonymized sentiment analysis, and wellness interventions

Highlights.name: unlock employee skills and potential
Highlights.description: Transform talent with AI driven personalized learning interventions, career progression, succession planning, individual development plans, HiPo identification and more

enhanced_description: entomo is a comprehensive people experience platform designed for the digital world of work, empowering over 30 million users globally. It transforms employee engagement, performance, and talent development through hyper-personalized AI-driven insights and nudges. The platform facilitates everyday alignment of organizational, team, and individual goals, and leverages Generative AI for peak employee performance. It also prioritizes employee well-being through AI-driven anonymized sentiment analysis and wellness interventions. Furthermore, entomo unlocks employee potential by providing AI-driven personalized learning interventions, career progression, succession planning, individual development plans, and HiPo identification. Its clientele includes Global Fortune 500 companies, large enterprises, and governments across Asia and MEA, and it has been recognized as a leader in multiple G2 software marketplace categories.
key_use_cases: Everyday alignment of organizational, team, and individual goals
Engaging and empowering talent development and skills
competitive_advantages: AI-driven anonymized sentiment analysis and wellness interventions

scalability_features: Designed to power 30mn+ users across organizations worldwide
